description: Level up from apprentice to master of creamy eggnog and wow family and friends with our easy-to-follow eggnog recipe.
name: Eggnog Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add bourbon to milk and egg mixture, then whisk until frothy. Pour among glasses. Top with a dollop of whipped cream, if using, and sprinkle over extra cinnamon, then serve.
